review_text: Very close to the Amtrak and made a great overnight stay. Bed was very comfortable and the coffee shop next door was handy.
Charisse’s place was exactly what the photos show. It was cozy, comfortable, easy to get to and near many shops, eateries, etc.
Very responsive host. Convenient location. Bed is very firm and there is some neighborhood noise.
Super convenient location for my stay
Great location for our weekend stay. Great coffee shop next door. Nice and warm for winter.

This place is clean, well supplied, and chic. Quiet neighborhood.
Thanks Charisse for allowing us to bring our dog with us at last minute notice, and giving us a discount at that. We would definitely stay here again!

I stayed here for 4 months while I was finishing up my last semester of school, and it was absolutely perfect! Charisse was an incredible host who was always quick to respond to anything I needed help with and just really cared about my comfort. The place was exactly as listed with one of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever had and just the perfect amount of space. It’s the perfect location as well for doing anything as everything in Downtown Provo is very close, but not so close that you have to deal with all the traffic and noise levels. Overall, I 100% recommend this place for everyone - it had everything I needed for a comfortable stay!
Place is just as listed! Felt right at home, and super comfortable with my stay. Would definitely recommend this location. Charisse is quick to respond as well with any questions!
The townhouse was nicely furnished. Comfortable and we felt at home. Great place to stay.
Good place to stay. Clean, plenty of space. Close to train and bus and a coffee shop right next door which makes it a little noisy. Host was very helpful and responsive.

This location was a great place to come back to after a long day. Parking was easy to find and was very close to a lot of great places to eat. It was a perfect place for my boyfriend and I to get away from our hectic lives. Definitely would love to come back here again.
Great place, very cute coffee shop next door. Close to DT Provo. Would stay there again.

We loved staying here. It's location is perfect for walking to center street in Provo. We walked over there one morning to Hruska's Kolaches which was amazing. There are so many other restaurants to choose from. It is such a cute little apartment as well. The bed is very comfortable. It has a great tv. We had no complaints whatsoever about this place. I would definitely choose this place again when we come back here.
everything just as stated in the listing period host was very helpful with individual questions and unique situation arriving in the middle of the night. wonderful stay for a single or couple.

Very comfortable place to stay. Especially perfect if coming by train or bus. There is parking, however, we did not have a car for our stay. Car was not needed as it was a very easy walk to downtown. Explored trails and area by using Bird Bike and scooters that were easy to fine. Then when we left we walked two blocks to the Car rental place to continue our journey. Provo is fantastic!
Very enjoyable stay!
great place. nice and quiet
We loved staying here and we want to come back! It was a good escape with so much to do around the location!

Had an excellent stay, place is super cozy and was the perfect location for our trip. Very walkable, close to restaurants, grocery store, and the mall. Off street, assigned parking was great. Bed and linens were very comfortable. Would stay with Charisse again in Provo.

I had a wonderful stay and absolutely loved the property. Everything was exactly as I imagined - or even better. Charisse is a great host and I appreciated the clear instructions and communication. I definitely plan to book it again when I come back to Provo and highly recommend it if you're in town. Blessings, Elayna
Great place to crash for a few nights

Although our stay was short it was exactly what we were looking for. Not expensive, quiet, right next door to a coffee shop (personal celebration on that one) and easy to find. Thank you Charisse for your hospitality! We appreciate you
My family enjoyed their time in this place. It has everything they needed for a short stay. Charisse was very helpful and great host.
Absolutely darling place. So cute and quaint. Very clean and neat area.
This place was super cozy and very clean. We had no issues checking in or out. The bed is very comfy and there was plenty of space for the two of us.

Had a very nice stay here; location was convenient (~7 minute walk to downtown, 3 min walk to train station) and the place was comfortable. Charisse was super helpful when I had trouble getting into the unit. Highly recommend staying here

The place was cute and clean and just perfect for our couple night stay. It was nice to have a parking space and the host was very easy to work with and accommodating when I needed to change some details of our reservation.

We really enjoyed our stay at this cozy Airbnb, but what really stood out was the communication from our host, Charisse. Charisse went above and beyond to ensure that we had everything we needed for our stay and was always quick to respond to our messages. We would highly recommend a stay here! We hope to be back soon.
This was our second stay at William’s place, and it was just as perfect as the first time!! Highly recommend!!
It was a great stay!
Place was spotless

Great stay, easy of rental, great communication and check in instructions pre our arrival. Convenient location for the needs of our stay in Provo. Close to downtown, walking distance to great restaurants / BYU. Thank you for the stay. Sorry about the dirty bathroom floor - we were in town for filming of The Chosen. 1st century dirt traveled back with us.
Exactly what we needed for our weekend.
This place is more than an ABB, it’s an experience. You can set the mood with many different colors of lights and everything is top in class!
We felt right at home. The only thing I would ask for is someone logging out of the Netflix. The person before set a Pin number and I couldn't set up my account.

The location was great - close to downtown Provo, so I was able to take several nice walks around the area during my stay. The house itself was very cozy. I only had to reach out to William once and he was quick to respond to my call. Also, as a fun surprise, the place had some fun lighting. Thanks William for the great place to stay!
We enjoyed our stay. Everything was clean and as expected. Check in was easy and check out was even easier, which we appreciated!

It was the perfect place to stay for a long weekend while visiting my daughter in college. The view of the mountains was beautiful! The place was modern, spotless, and welcoming. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit the area. William was wonderful to work with! We will stay again!

Overall, good place to stay. Felt safe. Comfy bed. Good place for 1 person, couples, or even parents with young kids (has enough space for pac n play & a pullout couch). Check in was easy & an amazing view from the front windows.
It’s the perfect spot if you’re looking for somewhere to relax and unwind after walking around or being out for the day! The fireplace is also so awesome for the colder months!
was a nicely updated studio. was very comfortable to stay in for the 2 weeks I was there would stay again.

This was a great little house, close to downtown and BYU. It fit my needs perfectly. It was a little chilly, so there were extra heaters I had to use, but with those, it was fine. It's at the end of a residential street, but around it are businesses like an auto garage, pawn shop, and a motel, so be aware of that. It had everything I needed, the bed was comfy, and it's perfect for a quick stay for 1 or 2 people.
Cute lil place in a great location! Would stay there again if we come back to Provo.
This was a fantastic place for us to stay! So close to everything and nice and cozy! Thank you again for a wonderful stay!

This was a great place! Super clean and the location was great! It was super cold when we got there and didn’t warm up for several hours, but William was helpful and everything was good by the end of our trip! Great place!
Great place if you’re traveling by yourself or with a significant other. It is literally right in the heart of Provo.

William’s place was awesome!! I was just passing through Provo on my way back home and booked a night’s stay last minute. It was so worth it! The studio was cozy, clean, and had amenities like a washer and dryer and a kitchen with appliances. My boyfriend and I were so impressed with how nice everything was! Plus the location is perfect, it’s walking distance to plenty of local shops and restaurants, and it’s right by the temple too so we were able to do all our sightseeing without having to drive everywhere. We loved everything about it and it ended up being the highlight of our trip! William was awesome too, he was very quick to answer all of our questions . I can’t say enough nice things about this place it was just great!
Would stay here again!
Great place to stay! Quite and in a good location to be able to go do things! Highly recommend

The entire process from initial payment to checkout was smooth, clear, and as expected. Cute, small, cozy place, right next to the Provo City Center Temple. The room was clean, organized, and included complimentary items. The ceiling lights were fun, and my girlfriend thought the welcome sign on the bed was cute! Great location as the street had very low traffic.
Great overall!
Very comfortable place to stay close to the shops and restaurants, quiet and peaceful. Will definitely go back.

This is the most wonderful little studio. Very clean and had everything we needed. Location was extremely close to center street and all its restaurants. William was really helpful and a responsive host. We totally recommend this place and would gladly stay again!

William was an awesome host and very responsive! I loved staying here for the weekend and it looks just like the gorgeous pictures! You get the hotel getaway without the hotel pricing or hassle! Would definitely recommend this cute airbnb to others!
This was a great experience. William was responsive and his place was cozy and welcoming. Perfect for what I needed. Wi-Fi worked well too.
I would stay again.

Myself and my mother felt right at home during our stay! It was a cute little place and had all the amenities we needed for our stay. The tv was huge which made for great entertainment during our nights in. There wasn’t too much commotion outside and we both slept great every night of our stay. Even though the house is on a frequented street it never once felt like it. It felt very private and it was easy to feel at home! We would 10/10 recommend and 10/10 stay again if available :)
Also Williams response time and communication also gets a 10/10. Wonderful host!
It’s a great place to stay. Looks exactly like the photos. I will definitely be coming back!
cozy place with everything you need.
super cute place!! unfortunately the road was closed for construction but we were able to get around the closed sign pretty easily! Very clean and cute duplex
The place was comfortable. I slept well. Everything was clean and in order. I felt like I was at home. It is so much nicer than being at a hotel. Thanks.

I made a mistake and thought I booked for two nights, but I really only booked for one. William was very understanding and sympathetic.
The place was great and everything was as expected in the unit. It was clean, comfortable, and well thought out.
The location was not as I expected. I expected it to be surrounded completely by other houses. But it was partially surrounded by houses and partially by commercial and industrial buildings.

If you’re interested in this little cute spot, don’t hesitate & book it! Super clean, smelled wonderful, the set up is so perfect. We felt very comfortable. They thought of everything in this little space. Everything is exactly as pictured but cuter in person. One of my favorite bookings so far!
Great stay
Great, clean, secure, worth the reservation.

This studio was immaculate, convenient to local restaurants & main roads, yet on a quiet street. Keurig was a plus, air conditioning wonderful. Only missed a blue ray player & deck of cards for evening relaxation!

Literally all new furnishings. Bed was comfortable. Bathroom had lots of room. The TV was huge. Location ideal for getting all over Provo and had easy freeway access too. Would definitely recommend this accommodation
Excellent little cottage in the heart of Provo! Walking distance to downtown. Very quiet at night. Highly recommended!
Such a great place. It was clean, easy to find and close to downtown Provo/ BYU. We enjoyed our stay as everything was spotless and very accommodating. Definitely recommend Williams place to anyone.
A great place to stay. Would highly recommend. Updated, clean and centrally located. Has all the amenities and then some.
The air conditioning units were super loud and one of the A/C units made popping sounds and made it quite difficult to sleep.

wonderful place to stay while visiting Provo. Close to downtown but on a quiet street. The inside is brand new and sparkly clean. All the amenities you could possibly imagine. We had a wonderful stay and would recommend it to anyone.
Close to downtown Provo, had everything I needed. You should give it a shot if you are considering.

William’s place was perfect. Very clean, and had everything we needed. Beautiful home, and located only a couple blocks from down town. When we arrived there were water bottles and a little welcome sign which added a nice touch to our stay!
Great location. Perfect for what we needed.
Beautiful, newly updated house, and helpful and responsive host.
Great place to stay.
Great place. Stayed with my toddler and it was a great location really nice inside and great location.
Williams place was so cozy and set up very nicely! The place was really clean and had everything we needed.

very clean and close to the Temple!
thank you so much for the cozy place!
Great updated place to stay near downtown Provo.
Place was super cozy and close to lots of activities, Matthew was very friendly and clear with instructions.
Worked great for my needs
A perfect cute little place in a nice neighborhood with everything I needed.
Quiet little area, had no issues with noise
Very clean and very nice place to stay for a few nights. Very close to Salt Lake City. Quiet neighborhood. Matthew was very helpful with our questions.

This place was perfect for my stay for a friend’s wedding. It has everything you would need and a little extra. The space is very efficient, clean, and cozy. I felt right at home and wished I could’ve stay longer. Matt was very helpful and responsive. Location was close to everything, but also tucked away and peaceful.
Nice little place

The bathroom outlet won't work, so I have to blow dry my hair in the living room. I can't watch Netflix because I need Mathew's personal code? I am not sure Netflix is included in the price or should I Pay my own Netflix. I wish this could be mentioned for the customer .

Just like the listing said, such a cute little studio! Close enough to downtown Provo for food and activities, but far enough away to not feel busy. Matthew was super accommodating and quick to respond.

Perfect spot for Women's Conference on BYU campus.
We had everything we needed. Awesome - clean place.
We would recommend it and hope to be able to stay here again!
Well stocked and taken care of! Comfortable !
Thank you!! It was a great place to crash for the night after driving 12 hours! Super comfortable and clean. Great neighborhood too, we Loved exploring downtown
Great place
Great value and a great little space that was quite comfortable to sleep, eat and base out of for the week!
Great tiny little place with everything we needed. Shouldn’t be judged by the outside of the building.
Easy to find, nice neighborhood to walk, and pretty mountains! Would recommend.
Great little place!
Nice and comfortable place. Space to work and the bed was comfortable.

Stayed at Matthew’s place for an event up at the Olympic nordic venue and it was just what I needed. Perfect and easy place to come back to and crash after a long day. Lots of restaurants and grocery stores nearby. BYU is just down the road for sporting events. The price was right and would definitely stay again.
Perfect little place for what I needed!! Nice and close to BYU campus, also felt super clean and safe! Would stay here again!! 😊
this was exactly what I needed a great place to rest.
No issues - thanks Matthew.

Cute and cozy. It is exactly what we needed for our trip. We were able to walk to our friends house within thirty minutes, which was a great bonus for us. It was also near gas stations, restaurants, and stores, which we loved.
Cute place. Definitely will be staying there again
Updated apartment was very cozy

The apartment was so cute & matthew was super awesome & helpful. I totally messed up the dates but he was super accommodating & kind. The place was clean & cute & perfect for my husband & I. We both agreed that we would definitely stay here again.
Clean, cute place-perfect for a getaway!
A great place to stay.
Cute place and a quiet area! Would recommend!
Easy, comfortable, and accommodating. Would stay again!
great place to stay in 😀
We absolutely loved staying here! It was cozy and had everything we needed. We loved that it was 3 minutes from downtown Provo! If we come back, we will definitely book again!!

This place is so cute! Perfect size for two people! We and a friend of mine needed a place to stop on our trip and we are so happy we stopped here! So much to do a few streets down and we enjoyed the food options! The place was spotless and so cute!
Clean, comfortable bed, just what we needed.
Great value. Just what I needed for a low cost place. The floors were cold, so bring house shoes or fuzzy socks if you come in the winter.

It was a nice stay definitely cozy, however ! We recommend installing a peephole since we had someone trying to come in into the apartment. it was a bit scary that we couldn’t see who it was, we open the door and it seem like it was an older man confused.
Other than that I really appreciate that this little cozy apartment had absolutely everything you could need thank you so much for having the most great essentials put into this studio. :) I definitely think that’s what made it more cozy and inviting.
it was great for the quick night we needed in provo

Cute little studio. Very clean and was exactly how described. Check in was very easy and pricing was amazing. Studio did not have central heat but we were supplied with a space heater and it worked perfect! 10/10 would definitely stay here again!
Very affordable place to stay if you want to check out the salt lake area, which is ~ a 30 drive. Matt is incredibly responsive, always replying within an hour to address any questions or concerns.
Matthew's place is great!! Easy to get to, great parking, perfect sized place for a couple to crash, really comfortable bed, cozy quiet environment and was a perfect point to stop for the night!

An amazing stay! The place was lovely, and very clean- and it had anything you could ever need in a small place like that! The overhead light switches from bright-white to a dim yellow, which was a super cool detail. The oven doesn't have a digital interface to check the temperature, but we figured that sticking a thermometer into a cracked oven-door is super effective. For the price, GO FOR IT!! The only downside is that the place is a tad far from some of the public transport lines, making it a hassle to trek around. I stayed in Provo in November when it was around 50°-60° during the day, obviously it got to the higher 30's at night, but I can only imagine going in January and trying to catch a bus (just make sure you're obviously appropriately dressed for Utah weather!), and having to walk quite a ways. But that's not a huge deal. Over all, amazing stay, and I would definitely stay again if I had better method of transport, but that's an issue on my end! Happy traveling everyone!

This was a cute little place to stay that was just right for my needs. It was a good price and easy to find and access. The bed was comfortable, I had everything I needed, and I was close to BYU and the other places I was going. It was a little tricky parking my big car 😉 and there was a loud noise in the middle of the night from the upstairs neighbors (maybe the hot water since that was the case in the bathroom I used?) along with some stomping around, but nothing major. I would stay here again.
No complaints. Smooth process.
Cute little place comfy cozy and Matthew was very responsive and friendly definitely would book again when in the area for sure love it!!

So inviting!!
And comfortable
Great getaway!
I stayed here for a conference, and I had a great experience. It’s in a quiet part of Provo, but it’s not far from the rest of town. It was what I needed for my stay.

Matthew’s place was incredibly cozy and comfortable. It’s a small apartment that has everything you might need during your stay. You can use the parking lot, which is extremely helpful when you rent a car, and the apartment is in a very nice area. Everything was clean and tidy, and Matthew was super nice and responsive at all times. Great experience.
This is a fantastic place! Super clean, comfortable, and walkable to downtown Provo which is full of shops and restaurants. Would highly recommend staying here.
All very nice!

This was a good place to stay while passing through town. Nothing fancy but has everything you need. As a heads up: there is a loud, high-pitched noise when the water in the unit and/or the water in the unit upstairs is running. So if the neighbor takes a late-night shower, you’re going to hear it… but it wasn’t a huge deal! Parking was easy. Bed was comfy.
Great Studio Apt. with everything you need to spend a night or more, stove, oven, refrigerator, and of course a comfortable bed. The price was perfect. We would stay again, if in the area.
This place was perfect for my purpose. Close to everything, comfortable sleep, and a good price. Thanks!

Matt's place was perfect! little studio apartment with everything you could need at your fingertips. books a TV refrigerator kitchenette dishes and even toiletries in the bathroom if you happen to forget something. it's so bright and clean in there that I felt like I was staying in a hotel room. Matt was excellent at communication and got back to me right away, and I really appreciated the bright light on outside at the apartment door. it was late when I got in and I felt comfortable. I loved the keyless entry with the code made it really easy. Will be staying here again!
Nice place🤘
clean studio in a nice area . would recommend to anyone traveling through provo

I had a great stay at Matthew's place and would love to stay there again! Thankfully, he is an accommodating host and supplied some new toiletries in the bathroom, because I forgot my toothbrush and face wash somehow! I really appreciated not having to go out late at night to the drugstore for a toothbrush and the makeup remover wipes worked wonders. The space was perfect for my simple needs while I attended a conference in the area. Matthew provided great hospitality and the accommodation of a late check out. I would definitely book again next time I'm in town!
A perfectly cute studio in the heart of Provo, UT. All of Provo is at your finger tips from this perfect place :)
Great little spot while in town for a short time.
Cute and cozy place to stay for a great price!
Had everything a little hermitage could need. Great books, clean space.
Thank you thank you thank you! The neighborhood is calm and quiet. The space is perfect for a weekend getaway. Really appreciate the use of NETFLIX and MAX without having to log on.
Matthew provided everything we needed. Great place!
Loved this place, would definitely come back!
Needed a room for an overnight work trip. Matthew’s place was just what I needed; a comfortable bed and quiet room. Very clean too and very easy to check into. Hope to stay again.

Matthew's place was prefect. It was exactly what I had looked for and it matched the description and my expectations perfectly. It is a low key, affordable place in the heart of Provo, centrally located but completely private and quiet. The place is clean and comfortable and had everything I needed. I hope to stay there again when I come back to Provo.

Matthew was super attentive, quick to respond and accommodate our check in needs. Matthew's space is super clean, functional, well stocked and comfortable. The location is also excellent. The neighborhood and surroundings are quiet.
Great place for a quick stay. Easy to find and everything you need.

This was perfect for me! I loved how close this is to center street where there are awesome restaurants and lots to do. Matthew payed really close attention to detail and everything I needed was there. I’d definitely stay again! Thank you Matthew! Also, great choice of books! I have many of the same.
Matt keeps the place clean and simple. I would stay there again .

Cute and clean studio!
Was perfect for my trip to Provo.
Matthew was responsive and made everything very easy for me.
I would definitely recommend this place and will gladly stay here again
Matthew's place was quiet and peaceful. Very close to the highway so easy access!
My stay was very nice, thank you very much

This is just what the listing states, a studio apartment in an old residence that has been converted into three apartments. The outside of the building is not that appealing, but the inside is nicely redone and is a great option if you just need a place to sleep, bathe and make a meal for a few nights. I would stay again.
Such a nice little place when you need to get away.
Had a wonderfully quiet stay. Very clean and convenient to everything we needed. Would definitely stay again!!!

A small place, but Matthew supplied everything you might need for a stay. It's a pleasant neighborhood and I loved how close things were because I had to walk. It was very quiet at all times of the day and night. Comfortable bed, clean linen, compact kitchen, but well stocked. Great shower and good amount of counter space in the bathroom.
I loved the ease of the locking mechanism you have and the view of the mountains from the window. You mentioned that you were new to Airbnb. I think you have done a great job. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again and would recommend it to friends.
Can't wait to return to this beautiful, cozy place. Perfect place close to everything. Love it.

Amazing place, great location, super nice place to stay for a few days, the only thing it failed to describe was its fair bit of bugs in and out of the house but apart from that I loved it and I would love to book again one day if it is possible.
I love loved the studio! It was super cute! Matthew was very responsive as-well! Highly recommend!
Great place to stay! Very clean and has just what you need. In a nice, walkable neighborhood. Very responsive and helpful host. Definitely recommend this place.
Nice place. Recommend if you have short trip to Provo

I loved staying at Matthew’s place! He thought of everything a guest could possibly need! I was blown away by the time and thought he put into preparing his place. It’s perfect. And so cute and so clean. And a great friendly neighborhood. I had a problem with my car and all the neighbors came out to help. I loved everything about my stay and will definitely be staying here again! Thanks Matthew!
Clean, cozy, and quiet with thoughtful touches. Great reading selection!
Cute little spot. Worked for what I needed in the moment. The parking lot is a little dark at night but it was a cute little spot.
Studio in a neat old house. Very quiet and comfortable bed. I think it is overpriced for the size but slept well and Matt communicated quickly.
Matthews place was perfect!!…very clean, and comfy…just needed an overnight stay as we were on a road trip, perfect parking area, had a parking place off the street
Matthew is an exceptionally thoughtful host. The place was immaculate and the bed was more comfortable than a hotel’s. If we return we will stay with him again.
Great little place to stay if you just need a place to sleep for a few nights.

This little place was perfect for a quick over night stay I needed in Provo. The place has everything you need, and is very clean and comfortable.
Matthew was quick to respond to all my inquiries.
The place is actually much nicer than the photos showed so it was a very pleasant surprise.
Great host!

this studio apartment was very cute, very clean, and adequately stocked.
It was perfect! our stay there was very very nice.
Matthew was very cordial and provided all the information we needed.
Loved the place, more than what I expected, great location and awesome host! :)
Impeccably clean, great host, safe ,everything was perfect
We were visiting family in Provo and didn’t expect to find this jewel amongst air bnb‘s which we encountered world wide so far - will definitely try to book this one next time, too!

If you are considering a visit to Provo, this is the place to stay. The home is beautiful and comfortable. You will feel right at home and the neighborhood is first-class. You will love waking up to the mountain view and watching the sun come up and the moon set. The location is right down the street from a new mall with restaurants and entertainment. You will enjoy working with the host -- she is lovely.
This was a beautiful place to stay. Britani was very kind and the house had everything we needed. It felt like a little escape to a cottage.
Amazing location and gorgeous guesthouse! 10/10 recommend!

Britani’s place was PERFECT!!! We felt right at home. Her home was beautifully decorated and extremely clean. We will definitely be back our next trip to the Provo area. Thank you so much again! We loved our stay!
We had an amazing stay at Britani’s! We felt right at home, the space is private and the scenery is beautiful. Would recommend this guesthouse to anyone in the area looking for a place to stay.
very quiet area no road noise or other traffic. b good place to relax and just chill out or be active as you want

My sister and I stayed here during our time in Utah filming as extras in the TV show, The Chosen. It was really an amazing, clean, and comfortable place to come back to after long days of being on set. The beds were so comfortable it felt like coming home to a real house. All the finishes felt top notch, well thought out, and clean. If we get the chance to be extras in Utah again, we'd definitely have this place on the top of our list of AirBnb's to stay at. The only other thing I would say is that it would be nice to have some more blinds/curtains especially in the bathrooms. Other than that, it was absolutely perfect! One of the best AirBnB's we've stayed at. So grateful for this wonderful, homey, and high-end place to stay during our time here!

We really enjoyed our stay. The unit was in a nice neighborhood that was close to a lot in Provo/Orem area. Beds were comfortable and the amenities were nice. Britani was also very responsive when we had some needs. Would 100% stay here again!

This is a great place. It is in a great location for food and shopping and very easy to get in and out of. The host gave clear instructions on how to get in and even though the this listing is behind the main houae, we felt like we had our space and privacy. Would definitely stay again!

I stayed at Britani’s for a week while in town for a neuro treatment program and it was absolutely perfect! It felt very safe, and comfortable. The neighborhood and mountain views were gorgeous! The kitchen was well stocked to be able to cook while I was there with no issue. The master bedroom bed was very comfortable. There were multiple shopping and restaurant options close by. I’d definitely recommend this place to anyone staying in the Provo area! It really is the full package of clean, comfortable and very pretty!
Great place to stay! Easy to find and comfortable.

I wish there was a TV in the bedroom. I did not notice that when I booked but the guest house was very nice and clean the beds were comfy and the location as lovely. Host was responsive and delightful.
Can’t say enough great things about this place. Without a doubt the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Absolutely perfect. Highly recommend!!

This was my second time staying in the guest house. Love the location and the beautiful gated neighborhood. Great proximity to Provo and Sundance. Nice high end finishes throughout. Probably be staying again next time I’m in town.

Cutest little guest house behind a home in a very nice gated community of homes. Beautiful open kitchen with large island and the most comfortable bar stools ever! lots of natural light. Enjoyed sitting by the gas fireplace looking at the picturesque view of the Mountains and waking up to the same view every morning. Perfect for 2-4 people sharing one car(limited parking). Overall the best place to rent in the Provo Orem area!

Absolutely beautiful guest home! It had everything we needed from full kitchen to great bathrooms! The neighborhood is absolutely gorgeous and so quiet and peaceful! Love the location because it’s minutes from BYU and also an easy jump to get into the Provo Canyon. We’lll be back to stay here for sure!

We loved our night away. The house was spotless, well furnished, very comfortable and in a fabulous neighborhood.
Host was quick to respond and very welcoming.
Location was fabulous and so were the mountain views.
We love it all and will return again. Highly recommend.

My son and I stayed at the place and it was a very comfortable home away. The beds and bedding were soft just like ours at home. Every item we needed or adjustment we needed to make was accommodated quickly. The host and family are very kind and friendly. I would highly recommend this excellent location and space.
Very nice place that we would happily stay at again.

This is a gorgeous guest house in a lovely, quiet neighborhood. It’s clean and comfortable. It’s in the backyard (you can see the main house from the glass doors in the living room on the listing) of the host’s home so not super private. I didn’t feel comfortable opening the curtains often because I value my privacy.
